This Final Amendment relates to the Issuer Tender Offer Statement on Schedule TO (the “Statement”) originally filed on December 2, 2024 by Brookfield Infrastructure Income Fund Inc. (the “Fund”) in connection with an offer by the Fund (the “Offer”) to purchase up to 5.0% of its outstanding shares of common stock (the “Shares”) at a price equal to the net asset value per Share as of December 31, 2024 (the “Valuation Date”), upon the terms and subject to the conditions set forth in the Offer to Purchase filed as Exhibit B to the Statement (the “Offer to Purchase”).

 

This is the Final Amendment to the Statement and is being filed to report the results of the Offer. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein shall have the meanings ascribed to them in the Offer to Purchase.

 

The following information is furnished pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c)(4):

 

1.The Offer expired at 5:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on December 31, 2024.

 

2.71,676.95 Shares of the Fund were validly tendered and not withdrawn prior to the expiration of the Offer. The Fund accepted for purchase 100% of the Shares of the Fund that were validly tendered and not withdrawn prior to the expiration of the Offer as permitted by Rule 13e-4(f)(1) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.

 

3.The net asset value of Shares tendered pursuant to the Offer was calculated as of the Valuation Date in the amount of approximately $745,330.53.

 

4.The Fund paid on or about February 4, 2025 to the tendering Shareholders a total of approximately $732,050.90 (net of the 2% Early Withdrawal Fees, where applicable), which represents the net asset value as of the Valuation Date of the total amount of Shares tendered by Shareholders upon the terms and subject to the conditions of the Offer.

 

Except as specifically provided herein, the information contained in the Statement and the Transmittal Letter remains unchanged and this Final Amendment does not modify any of the information previously reported on the Statement or the Transmittal Letter.

 

2

 

 

SIGNATURE

 

After due inquiry and to the best of my knowledge and belief, I certify that the information set out in this statement is true, complete, and correct.
